remarks: Lemma for ~ smu01 and ~ smu02 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2016.)
statement:
smu01lem.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ NN0 ) $.
smu01lem.2 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ NN0 ) $.
smu01lem.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. NN0 /\ n e. NN0 ) ) -> -. ( k e. A /\ ( n - k ) e. B ) ) $.
smu01lem $p |- ( ph -> ( A smul B ) = (/) ) $.
$d A k n $.
$d B k n $.
$d k n ph $.
